biotools.summary: CancerTSP is a web-bench designed for stage prediction of Papillary Thyroid Carcinoma (PTC) using RNA expression data (derived from RNA-seq experiments in the form of RNA-Seq FPKM values). Primarily Early v/s Late stage prediction module predicts stage of PTC tissue sample. Further Cancer v/s Normal prediction module predicts whether tissue sample is cancerous or normal. Analysis module allows the user to analyze data regarding expression of an RNA transcript in Early or Late stage of PTC.
